abilities.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.c8bacc17f73d3103]{Face Danger} +edge by evading an attack without fighting back and score a weak hit, inflict 1 harm. On a strong hit, inflict 2 harm instead. This does not represent physical damage, but fatigue or frustration on the foe's part as they struggle to engage in combat with you.
Same as above, but add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

When you attempt to @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.aac3783710ad7499]{End the Fight} without having used @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.5288e935906f6d28]{Strike} or @UUID[Compendium.foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.Item.7e008d0f656dc8b3]{Clash} in the battle, subtract -1 from each challenge die.
